name: Blood-Craftian
description:
Fight mobsters and eldritch monsters while you’re stuck in a time-loop. Explore randomly generated environments and fight for your survival while you discover who(or what) trapped you in time. 

-Play as detective Raymond Fortier, a grizzled detective that thought he had seen it all, as he explores the ever-shifting streets of New Chicago. 

-Utilize the unique dual wield mechanic to blast your enemies to bits.

-Find mysterious artifacts that give you increased combative capabilities, but always at a cost.

-Fight for your freedom as you fight your way through a time-loop.

=================================================================

Keyboard Controls

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Look - The player character will look towards the Mouse Cursor

Dash - Shift or Control

Interact - F or Numpad 0

Fire Left Weapon - Left Mouse Button

Fire Right Weapon - Right Mouse Button

Reload - R (Also occurs automatically when trying to fire a weapon without ammo)

Pause - Escape

Menus - Can be navigated using the Mouse
